title: StarBeam: Advancing Space Communication & Debris Clearance with Lasers
description: STARBEAM aims to advance the development of Free Space Optics (FSO) and High Energy Laser (HEL) payloads for dual-purpose applications: space debris mitigation and next-generation communication capabilities. By leveraging cutting-edge technologies, STARBEAM seeks to enhance our ability to track, target, and mitigate space debris while simultaneously exploring the potential of FSO for high-speed, secure communication links between satellites and ground stations. Through interdisciplinary collaboration among experts in optics, aerospace engineering, and computer science, STARBEAM aims to push the boundaries of space technology, addressing critical challenges in space debris management and revolutionizing satellite communication infrastructure for future space missions.
